orca.alpha package¶

Submodules¶

orca.alpha.base module¶

class orca.alpha.base.AlphaBase(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for alphas.

Note

This is a base class and should not be used directly.

LOGGER_NAME = 'alpha'¶
critical(msg)[source]¶

Logs a message with level CRITICAL on the alpha logger.

debug(msg)[source]¶

Logs a message with level DEBUG on the alpha logger.

error(msg)[source]¶

Logs a message with level ERROR on the alpha logger.

generate(date)[source]¶

Override (mandatory) to generate alpha on a particular day.

This is the sole interface of an alpha class.

Parameters:date (str) – a 8-length date string like yyyymmdd.
info(msg)[source]¶

Logs a message with level INFO on the alpha logger.

set_debug_mode(debug_on)[source]¶

Enable/Disable debug level messages in the alpha. This is enabled by default.

warning(msg)[source]¶

Logs a message with level WARNING on the alpha logger.

Bases: orca.alpha.base.BacktestingAlpha
